title: New Update
side_note_text: We truly appreciate your support and are excited to bring you even more innovative features to enhance your experience in the future.

*ðŸ›  Bug Fixes & Improvements*
- *Fixed playback issues* for video URLs without extensions.

- *New settings options:*
  - Choose your preferred decoder type (SW, HW, HW+).
  - Enable video brightness memory for a consistent viewing experience.

- *Added Authorization & Extra Header support* in the "Add Video" menu for enhanced compatibility.
- *Manual lock screen* in the player (tap & hold for fast mode).
- *Extended video source support:* Now works with YacineTV, Pdrain/PixelRain, MediaFire, and more!

*ðŸš€ Upcoming Features*
Weâ€™re hard at work on some amazing new features! Hereâ€™s a sneak peek:

- *Subtitle support* for both streaming and local videos.

- *Backup support:* Save all bookmarks and home lists to server or local storage.
